Title: Last Laugh
Plot: Grissom and Catherine investigate the murder of a despised comic who died onstage, apparently after drinking from a tainted bottle of water. Brass reopens a woman's accidental-death case after spotting the deceased's husband in a flashy new car with a trophy date on his arm.
GuestStars: Bobcat Goldthwait, Jeffrey Ross, Gilbert Gottfried, Bryan Callen, Alan Blumenfeld, Jeff Perry, Tom Gallop, Anthony E. Zuiker, Sandra Purpuro, Maggie Wheeler, Leslie Bega, Larry Thomas, Molly Weber, Bryan Callen
